body.p:
Madisonville Hopkins County Ky 15th Octr 1863
His Excellency Thos E. Bramlett Governer of Ky
Dear Sir
In your proclamation of the 9th Int you request some friend of his country to recommend some suitable persons for colonel and Lieutenant Col for there county
We the undersigned would respectfully recommend Thomas W. Campbell for Colonel of this Hopkins County Ky and Richard L. Peyton for Lieutenant Colonel we are respectfully

yours
James W. Wilkins
Otway Waddell
J M Compton

Hopkins Co Oct 15/63
Recm"dg for this county
Thos W Campbell as Colonel
Richard L Peyton Lt Col
Citizens
